        <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {

    var operation = current.operation();
    var roleAssignmentUtil = new WPRoleAssignmentUtils();

    //flow
    var inputs = {};
    inputs['clientrole_current'] = current;

    var curExtValid = WPUtils.isExtenstionOf(WPConstants.COMMON_TABLES.SYS_USER, current.table);

    var prevExtValid = false;
    if (!gs.nil(previous))
        prevExtValid = WPUtils.isExtenstionOf(WPConstants.COMMON_TABLES.SYS_USER, previous.table);

    if (operation == 'insert') {
        if (!curExtValid || !current.active)
            return;
        inputs['action'] = 'assign'; //ASSIGN AS PER CURRENT
    } else if (operation == 'delete') {
        if (!curExtValid || !current.active)
            return;
        setInputForRevoke(current);
        inputs['action'] = 'revoke'; //REVOKE AS PER CURRENT
    } else if (operation == 'update') {
        if (current.active.changesTo("false")) {
            if (!curExtValid)
                return;
            setInputForRevoke(previous);
            inputs['action'] = 'revoke'; //REVOKE AS PER PREVIOUS
        } else if (current.active.changesTo("true")) {
            if (!curExtValid)
                return;
            inputs['action'] = 'assign'; //ASSIGN AS PER CURRENT
        } else if (!current.active)
			return;
		else if ((prevExtValid || curExtValid) && (current.table.changes() || current.condition.changes() || current.role.changes())) {
            if (prevExtValid) {
                setInputForRevoke(previous);
                inputs['action'] = 'revoke'; //REVOKE AS PER PREVIOUS
            }
            if (curExtValid) {
                if (inputs['action'] == 'revoke')
                    inputs['action'] = 'both'; //ASSIGN AS PER CURRENT; REVOKE AS PER PREVIOUS
                else
                    inputs['action'] = 'assign'; //ASSIGN AS PER CURRENT;
            }
        }
    }

    sn_fd.FlowAPI.startSubflow('sn_wsd_core.workplace_client_role_assignment_subflow', inputs); //the context id returned is not useful this release

    function setInputForRevoke(roleAssignGR) {
        inputs['prev_table'] = roleAssignGR.table;
        inputs['prev_condition'] = roleAssignGR.condition;
        inputs['prev_roleid'] = roleAssignGR.role;
    }

})(current, previous);]]></script>
